name: mtn-install
description: Install Mantine in your Next.js project with a CLI tool

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.prepublishGit: git add . && git commit -m "chore: publish" && git push
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublishOnly && npm run prepublishGit && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version major && npm publish
